entry.dcterms:title: The political and economic attitudes among the adult population, media consumption, knowledge of occupational and demographic structure in Hungary, 2007
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-G74: The political and economic attitudes among the adult population, media consumption, knowledge of occupational and demographic structure in Hungary, 2007. data sheet. Version: 2011-04-07
entry.dcterms:creator: Balogh, Anikó
entry.dcterms:description: The aim of the survey is to collect information about the political and economic attitudes among the adult population, media consumption, knowledge of occupational and demographic structure.
entry.dcterms:subject: equality and inequality
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
A
